Axe
Invoker
Crystal Maiden
Earthshaker
Drow Ranger
Tinker
Anti-Mage
Mirana
A powerful tank hero with strong initiation abilities.
Invoker is a versatile spellcaster with many abilities to adapt to any situation.
Crystal Maiden is a ranged support hero with abilities that provide crowd control and mana regeneration.
Earthshaker is a support hero with strong area-of-effect abilities and crowd control potential.
Drow Ranger is a ranged agility hero with strong damage output and a silencing ability.
Tinker is a brilliant inventor with powerful nukes and the ability to constantly reposition with rearm.
Anti-Mage is a mobility-focused hero with the ability to burn mana and avoid magic damage.
Mirana is a versatile hero with ranged damage, a powerful arrow stun, and mobility skills.
